remarks: Lemma for ~ gsummulg and ~ gsummulgz .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsummulg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsummulg.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsummulg.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
gsummulg.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsummulg.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) $.
gsummulg.w $e |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp .0. ) $.
gsummulglem.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsummulglem.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. ZZ ) $.
gsummulglem.o $e |- ( ph -> ( G e. Abel \/ N e. NN0 ) ) $.
gsummulglem $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> ( N .x. X ) ) ) = ( N .x. ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) ) ) $.
$d .x. k $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
